Sinopse: After trying to pull off a heist, Lupin encounters a group of killers called the Tarantulas. One of them so happen to have his long lost special Wather P38, he once own. But he doesn't know that it won't be so easy to escape the island with the gold the Assassins smuggled.—J LeGault
